about.summary: An interactive image editing tool that can be added as part of the HTML in Shiny, R markdown or any type of HTML document. Often times, plots, photos are embedded in the web application/file. 'drawer' can take screenshots of these image-like elements, or any part of the HTML document and send to an image editing space called 'canvas' to allow users immediately edit the screenshot(s) within the same document. Users can quickly combine, compare different screenshots, upload their own images and maybe make a scientific figure.

An interactive image editing tool that can be added as part of the HTML in Shiny, R markdown or any type of HTML document. Often times, plots, photos are embedded in the web application/file. 'drawer' can take screenshots of these image-like elements, or any part of the HTML document and send to an image editing space called 'canvas' to allow users immediately edit the screenshot(s) within the same document. Users can quickly combine, compare different screenshots, upload their own images and maybe make a scientific figure.

name: r-drawer
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.0.1" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-drawer
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/drawer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/drawer/drawer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 05c2ea05c7c8780e30fa6f036033894b162b41917ce0e00be210dc692605bc98

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

# Suggests: testthat, ggplot2
requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-bsplus
    - r-glue
    - r-htmltools
    - r-magrittr
    - r-shiny
    - r-stringr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-bsplus
    - r-glue
    - r-htmltools
    - r-magrittr
    - r-shiny
    - r-stringr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('drawer')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('drawer')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/lz100/drawer
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: An interactive image editing tool that can be added as part of the HTML in Shiny, R markdown or any type of HTML document. Often times, plots, photos are embedded in the web application/file. 'drawer' can take screenshots of these image-like elements, or any part of the HTML document and send to an image editing
    space called 'canvas' to allow users immediately edit the screenshot(s) within the same document. Users can quickly combine, compare different screenshots, upload their own images and maybe make a scientific figure.

  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:

# Package: drawer
# Title: An Interactive HTML Image Editing Tool

# Date: 2021-02-25

# Description: An interactive image editing tool that can be added as part of the HTML in Shiny, R markdown or any type of HTML document. Often times, plots, photos are embedded in the web application/file. 'drawer' can take screenshots of these image-like elements, or any part of the HTML document and send to an image editing space called 'canvas' to allow users immediately edit the screenshot(s) within the same document. Users can quickly combine, compare different screenshots, upload their own images and maybe make a scientific figure.
# Depends: R (>= 4.0.0)
# Imports: htmltools, magrittr, glue, bsplus, utils, shiny, stringr
# Suggests: testthat, ggplot2
# License: GPL (>= 3)
